title: ‘Mayor of Kingstown’ Trailer, ‘Only Murders in the Building,’ and Brandon Flowers and Ronnie Vannucci of The Killers
description:
Chris and Andy talk about the trailers that just came out for Taylor Sheridan’s ‘Mayor of Kingstown’ and the new sci-fi show ‘The Wheel of Time’ (4:43). Then they talk about the first few episodes of ‘Only Murders in the Building’ (23:19) before Andy is joined by The Killers members Brandon Flowers and Ronnie Vannucci (32:30).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guests: Brandon Flowers and Ronnie Vannucci
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
